content: **knitted head-band with cable in drops merino extra fine the piece is worked with lace pattern sizes s -m- l ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no me-233 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s m l fits head-size approx 54/56 56/58 58/60 cm height approx 10 11½ 13 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-100 g colour 08 light beige or use 100-100-100 colour 06 brown 100-100-100 colour 07 light brown 100-100-100 colour 01 off white needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
